cairns.david.engine

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • cairns.david.engine.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality for a moving animated image or Sprite.
    Author:
    David Cairns

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Draws the sprite with the graphics object 'g' at the current x and y co-ordinates.
      void drawTransformed(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Draws the sprite with the graphics object 'g' at the current x and y co-ordinates with the current scaling and rotation transforms applied.
      Animation getAnimation()
      Returns a reference to the current animation assigned to this sprite.
      int getHeight()
      Gets this Sprite's height, based on the size of the current image.

      Gets this Sprite's current image.

      Gets the sprites radius in pixels

      Get the current value of the rotation attribute.

      Get the current value of the scaling attribute.

      Gets the horizontal velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      Gets the vertical velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      Gets this Sprite's width, based on the size of the current image.

      Gets this Sprite's current y position.

      Hide the sprite.

      Check the visibility status of the sprite.

      Pause the animation when it reaches frame 'f'.

      Set the current animation to the given 'frame'

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Animation anim)
        Creates a new Sprite object with the specified Animation.
        Parameters:
        a - The animation to use for the sprite.

    • Method Detail

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(Animation a)
        Change the animation for the sprite to 'a'.
        Parameters:
        a - The animation to use for the sprite.

      • setAnimationFrame

        public void setAnimationFrame(int frame)
        Set the current animation to the given 'frame'
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame to set the animation to

      • pauseAnimation

        public void pauseAnimation()
        Pauses the animation at its current frame. Note that the sprite will continue to move, it just won't animate

      • pauseAnimationAtFrame

        public void pauseAnimationAtFrame(int f)
        Pause the animation when it reaches frame 'f'.
        Parameters:
        f - The frame to stop the animation at

      • setAnimationSpeed

        public void setAnimationSpeed(float speed)
        Change the speed at which the current animation runs. A speed of 1 will result in a normal animation, 0.5 will be half the normal rate and 2 will double it. Note that if you change animation, it will run at whatever speed it was previously set to.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to set the current animation to.

      • playAnimation

        public void playAnimation()
        Starts an animation playing if it has been paused.

      • getAnimation

        public Animation getAnimation()
        Returns a reference to the current animation assigned to this sprite.
        Returns:
        A reference to the current animation

      • update

        public void update(long elapsedTime)
        Updates this Sprite's Animation and its position based on the elapsedTime.
        Parameters:
        The - time that has elapsed since the last call to update

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Gets this Sprite's current x position.

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Gets this Sprite's current y position.

      • setX

        public void setX(float x)
        Sets this Sprite's current x position.

      • setY

        public void setY(float y)
        Sets this Sprite's current y position.

      • shiftX

        public void shiftX(float shift)

      • shiftY

        public void shiftY(float shift)

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets this Sprite's width, based on the size of the current image.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets this Sprite's height, based on the size of the current image.

      • getRadius

        public float getRadius()
        Gets the sprites radius in pixels

      • getVelocityX

        public float getVelocityX()
        Gets the horizontal velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      • getVelocityY

        public float getVelocityY()
        Gets the vertical velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      • setVelocityX

        public void setVelocityX(float dx)
        Sets the horizontal velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      • setVelocityY

        public void setVelocityY(float dy)
        Sets the vertical velocity of this Sprite in pixels per millisecond.

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float s)
        Set the scale of the sprite to 's'. If s is 1 the sprite will be drawn at normal size. If 's' is 0.5 it will be drawn at half size. Note that scaling and rotation are only applied when using the drawTransformed method.

      • getScale

        public double getScale()
        Get the current value of the scaling attribute. See 'setScale' for more information.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(double r)
        Set the rotation angle for the sprite in degrees. Note that scaling and rotation are only applied when using the drawTransformed method.

      • getRotation

        public double getRotation()
        Get the current value of the rotation attribute. in degrees. See 'setRotation' for more information.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the sprites movement at the current position

      • getImage

        public java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets this Sprite's current image.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draws the sprite with the graphics object 'g' at the current x and y co-ordinates. Scaling and rotation transforms are NOT applied.

      • drawTransformed

        public void drawTransformed(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draws the sprite with the graphics object 'g' at the current x and y co-ordinates with the current scaling and rotation transforms applied.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object to draw to,

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hide the sprite.

      • show

        public void show()
        Show the sprite

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Check the visibility status of the sprite.

      • setOffsets

        public void setOffsets(int x,
                       int y)
        Set an x & y offset to use when drawing the sprite. Note this does not affect its actual position, just moves the drawn position.
